name: Crimson Cave
description:
Hello there ! 

Finally i finished something. This is my submission for the Mini Jam 72.

Theme : Aventure

Limitation : Death must be a core mechanic.

So I tried to create a classic robot dungeon with a mechanic of death. This is the first game jam I do.
I’m waiting for your feedback. I really want to improve.
You will surely encounter some bugs. Tell me that I have corrected it.

Mini Story:
You finally found Crimson Cave, the cursed dungeon where your sister Alice is being held.
Walk the dark corners of this dungeon, fight the monsters, survive and save Alice. Watch out hero, a curse that corrupts your soul rages in these places. Don’t die. Or you will regret it !!!

Game:
When the player dies, he returns to the first piece and starts the game with one less HP. If the player dies 4 times, he returns to the first room as for previous deaths. He again has 4HP but his body.

Controls:

WASD  or Up-Down-Left-Right  :  to move

Space : to attack

PS: I didn’t have time to create music, success screens, game over screens and full
other basic things I haven’t had time to implement.

Try to have fun indeed :)
